resources.string: If you\'re unsure, someone in your school\'s administration should be able to give you it.
First, we need to know a little about you and your school. To start receiving notifications, press continue below.
Filtering your alerts will allow us to only show you what you need to see. If you want to see everything, click no.
You\'re all set to start getting notifications. Remember, you can change this any time from the options menu.
You have indicated that you wish to tailor your notifications to you. Would you like notifications about your bus route, entire school, or entire school board?
Enter the name of the school you\'d like updates about. For example, enter \"Governor Simcoe\" if you would like updates about Governor Simcoe Secondary School.
Enter the acronym for your school board. For example, if you\'d like updates for the District School Board of Niagara, enter \"DSBN\".
You\'re all set to start getting personalized notifications. Remember, you change this any time from the options menu.
